title: Ummah.build Islamic Tech Ideas
description: Open source Islamic tech ideas: prayer tools, mosque apps, zakat, Quran, Ramadan, Islamic finance. Filter and contribute at ideas.ummah.build.

items.title: ü§≤ PRAYSAP
items.content_text:
The only app to connect with Muslims to prayers. Making prayers a habit with the Ummah.
‚Ä¢ Real-time prayer time notifications based on user location
‚Ä¢ Nearby Muslim discovery for congregation prayers
‚Ä¢ Prayer streak tracking and gamification
‚Ä¢ Mosque finder with walking directions
‚Ä¢ Community prayer challenges and leaderboards

‚Ä¢ Smart prayer alarms including Tahajjud calculations

items.title: üìú ShariaConvert
items.content_text:
Automatically convert legal documents into Sharia-compliant ones. Convert any conventional contract into a Shariah-compliant version in minutes. Built with privacy-first architecture ‚Äî all processing happens locally in your browser.
‚Ä¢ Convert any conventional contract into a Shariah-compliant version in minutes
‚Ä¢ Privacy-first architecture ‚Äî all processing happens locally in your browser
‚Ä¢ Contract Editor ‚Äî Markdown-based dual-pane editor with live preview
‚Ä¢ Compliance Analyzer ‚Äî Automatic detection of Shariah violations (riba, gharar, maysir)
‚Ä¢ Template Library ‚Äî pre-built Shariah-compliant contract templates
